A cryptocurrency buying and exchanging app created with React.js and Socket.IO.
Cryptocurrency exchanger project featuring React.js, React Router, TypeScript, Socket.IO, and Docker for efficient exchange operations.
Quite an interesting project I've been working on. Using

, I created a website that allows users to exchange cryptocurrency. The interface was created using Tailwind CSS, and communication with the backend is mostly done using Socket.io messaging. Also, the project has a pretty simple internationalization. In this project I only worked on Frontend and a little bit on DevOps.

The site is quite simple, globally it consists of a cryptocurrency exchange component and minimalistic content pages, so I chose React.js. I also decided to use TypeScript in this project to simplify the work of future developers and protect the client from unexpected errors.

The project was finished quite quickly, during the work I mastered working with Socket.io, strengthened my knowledge about dockerization of projects and about routing in React.js. Most importantly, I got to know Vite.
